de.iabg.mode.event
Class ModeCorrelationSaveAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      de.iabg.mode.event.ModeCorrelationSaveAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
public class ModeCorrelationSaveAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction

This Action checks if the JModeCorrelationPanel has stored mode correlations. If this is true, it automatically retrieves the mode correlation and exports it to the current mode correlation output file. If the check is false, it displays an error to the user.

Version:
September 13, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
See Also:
